history.proof: intros. unfold subcode. hauto lq: on use: app_nil_l, app_assoc, Nat.add_0_r unfold: length.

exceptions.tactic: intros X m n r l H.
intros X' m n r l H.
intros X' m' n r l H.
intros X' m' n' r l H.
intros X' m' n' r' l H.
intros X' m' n' r' l' H.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

original: intros X m n r l H. intros H1. split. - unfold subcode. exists l, r. rewrite H1. reflexivity. - rewrite H1. apply H.
